SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into rc_vendor (NAME, CONTACT_PERSON, CREATE_TIME, EMAIL, MOBILE, DESCRIPTION) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update rc_vendor
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_PERSON = #{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where VENDOR_ID = #{vendorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
